title: The Girl Who Lived Twice
description: In the middle of the night Mia wakes to a terrifying experience. The following morning she realizes that her life has changed in ways she cannot explain. Gradually she has to accept that she has 'slipped through a crack in the fabric of time'.In this new existence Mia has opportunities not previously available to her: To change the things that went wrong and to avenge herself on those who wronged her. But taking control of events bring unforeseen danger. With the help of new friends and a new lover she faces the challenges. Mia needs courage and new skills to avoid death at the hands of those who want her out of the way.
author: Tina Clough
